name: agnostic-test
description: Run tests in VS Code across different languages with Zero ConfigurationÂ®.

agnostic-test.php.pest.command.description: A custom PHP Pest command. Default command is `vendor/bin/pest`.

agnostic-test.php.pest.docker.rootDirect.description: If the PHP project is part of a Docker Compose project, and the command is running in a Docker container, provide the root directory of your PHP application here.

agnostic-test.php.phpunit.command.description: A custom PHP PHPUnit command. Default command is `vendor/bin/phpunit`.

agnostic-test.php.phpunit.docker.rootDir.description: If the PHP project is part of a Docker Compose project, and the command is running in a Docker container, provide the root directory of your PHP application here.

agnostic-test.javascript.jest.command.description: A custom JavaScript Jest command. Default command is `node_modules/.bin/jest`.

agnostic-test.javascript.jest.docker.roo.description: If the JavaScript project is part of a Docker Compose project, and the command is running in a Docker container, provide the root directory of your JavaScript application here.

agnostic-test.javascript.vitest.command.description: A custom JavaScript Vitest command. Default command is `node_modules/.bin/vitest`.

agnostic-test.javascript.vitest.docker.r.description: If the JavaScript project is part of a Docker Compose project, and the command is running in a Docker container, provide the root directory of your JavaScript application here.

agnostic-test.javascript.mocha.command.description: A custom JavaScript Mocha command. Default command is `node_modules/.bin/mocha`.

agnostic-test.javascript.mocha.docker.ro.description: If the JavaScript project is part of a Docker Compose project, and the command is running in a Docker container, provide the root directory of your JavaScript application here.

agnostic-test.javascript.cypress.command.description: A custom JavaScript Cypress command. Default command is `node_modules/.bin/cypress`.

agnostic-test.javascript.cypress.docker..description: If the JavaScript project is part of a Docker Compose project, and the command is running in a Docker container, provide the root directory of your JavaScript application here.

agnostic-test.elixir.exunit.command.description: A custom Elixir ExUnit command. Default command is `mix test`.

agnostic-test.elixir.exunit.docker.rootD.description: If the Elixir project is part of a Docker Compose project, and the command is running in a Docker container, provide the root directory of your Elixir application here.
